name: Quick Draw! #TweetTweetJam
description:
A very simple quick draw game. Shoot them before they shoot you.

Click on the game and press any key to start. When the O appears on screen, hit any key to shoot before you die! Score is displayed at the top. If it resets to 0, you weren't fast enough.

Note: I do not recommend using the spacebar as your trigger. Many browsers use this as "scroll down".

Game made in, like, an hour
